title: Gears Tactics – Update 4 + DLC
body:
Gears Tactics – Update 4 + DLC


Genres/Tags: Strategy, Tactics, Isometric, 3D, Turn-based
Companies: Splash Damage, The Coalition, Xbox Game Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 28.6 GB
Repack Size: from 19.2 GB [Selective Download]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Unlike initial release, the game no longer works under Windows 7
  • Based on Gears.Tactics.Jacked-CODEX ISO release: codex-gears.tactics.jacked.iso (30,700,634,112 bytes)
  • Game version is Update 4 (Jacked); Thrashball Cole Character Pack DLC is included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selecitive Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of voiceover packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 28.6 to 19.2~20.1 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~25 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~50 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 30 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses compression library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Gears Tactics is the fast-paced, turn-based strategy game set 12 years before the first Gears of War. Cities on the planet Sera are beginning to fall to the monstrous threat rising from underground – the Locust Horde. With the government in disarray, a squad of survivors emerge as humanity’s last hope. Play as Gabe Diaz, recruiting, developing and commanding your squads on a desperate mission to hunt down the relentless and powerful leader of the Locust army: Ukkon, the mastermind monster who makes monsters. Against all odds and fighting for survival, outsmart your enemy in uniquely brutal, turn-based tactical combat. Experience the intensity of one of the most-acclaimed video game sagas in an exciting new way.

Game Features

  • Immersive and character-driven story: Play as the defiant soldier Gabe Diaz, rescuing and building your troops in a journey of leadership, survival and sacrifice.
  • Customizable squad and equipment: Prepare your troops to face tough enemies, upgrading their skills and outfitting them with loot collected in challenging missions.
  • Aggressive gameplay: Command your squad in fast paced, turn-based battles, advancing and surviving intense and visceral encounters with the unstoppable, swarming enemy.
  • Massive boss battles: Defeat towering deadly bosses that defy your strategies and completely change the scale of the battle.

You can skip downloading of voicepacks you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files. Remember, at least one voice pack MUST be downloaded and installed:

  • fg-selective-english.bin (REQIRED for all languages without own voicepacks)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin (both Spanish varians are included)

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-03).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with my previous GT repack.
